column2: PENNSYLVANIA DRIVER'S LICENSE TEST
Question Text
1. This road sign means:
2. This is:
3. To avoid having to make an emergency stop while driving in traffic, drivers should:
column4: look ahead and maintain a safe following distance.
column6: drive slower than the flow of traffic.
column8: drive in the right lane only.
column10: sound their horn to warn other drivers.

column2: 4. You can pass on the right:
column4: when a vehicle ahead makes a right turn.
column6: when a vehicle that is approaching from the opposite direction is prepared to turn left.
column8: when passing is restricted by parked cars.
column10: when a vehicle ahead makes a left turn.

column2: 5. What should you do if your vision through the windshield becomes blocked?
column6: Open the side window so you can see.
column8: Pull your vehicle off the road and park it.

column2: 6. This sign means:
column4: No parking between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.
column6: Parking is not allowed at 8:30 AM and at 5:30 PM
column8: You can only park between 8:30 AM and 5:30 PM.

column2: 7. This sign indicates:
column6: Do not use your phone while driving

column2: 8. What does the flashing signal in the picture indicate?
column6: The same thing as a stop sign.
column8: Pedestrians should start crossing the street.
column10: Pedestrians should finish crossing the street if started.

column2: 9. The first sign drivers see when approaching a highway-rail intersection is usually:
10. Drivers must use their headlights when other vehicles are not visible from _____ feet away.
11. This sign warns drivers that:
column6: another road enters the highway from the direction shown.
column10: the road will make a sharp turn to the right.

column2: 12. What should you do if one of your tires blows out?
column4: Decrease speed, pull over to the right and sound your horn to warn the other vehicles.
column6: Hold the steering wheel tight and slowly take your foot off the gas pedal.
column8: Hold the steering wheel tight and brake immediately to avoid the risk of skidding.

column2: 13. This sign indicates:
14. A flashing red light at a railroad crossing means:
column4: Slow down and proceed through the intersection.
column8: Stop, then proceed with caution only after all signals are completed.

column2: 15. When a truck driver behind you wants to pass your vehicle, you should:
column4: maintain or decrease your current speed.

column2: 16. This road sign means:
17. If an intersection has crosswalk lines but no STOP line, where must you stop for a red light?
18. A first conviction for driving under the influence (DUI) at any blood alcohol concentration level will result in:
column4: losing your license for up to 2 years.
column6: a driving curfew from 1 AM to 5 AM.
column10: being required to conduct a public education class on the risks of alcohol.
